sentences.en: Hand wheel, lever and spanner driving and safety valve, pressure reducing valve, traps overleap this symbol.
sentences.cn: 注:1、手轮 、 手柄和扳手传动以及安全阀 、 减压阀 、 疏水阀省略本代号.

sentences.en: In practical application, robots often need jumping devices to overleap obstacles or ditches.
sentences.cn: 摘要机器人在实际应用时, 很多时候要求其具备弹跳装置以便跃过障碍物或沟渠.
你过于粗心大意，这会毁了你!
